title: Colombia suspends arms imports from Israel
description:
Colombia’s President Gustavo Petro on Thursday suspended arms imports from Israel and called on a global boycott of the self-proclaimed Jewish State. In a tweet, Petro announced the import ban…

The post Colombia suspends arms imports from Israel appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.

title: Colombia’s ombudsman warns for possible turf wars in Bogota
description:
Colombia’s Ombudsman’s Office issued an alert about escalating tensions between paramilitary organization AGC and Venezuelan drug trafficking organization Tren de Aragua in Bogota. In the alert, the Ombudsman’s Office said…
